article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

Last week the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribe became the first in South Dakota to legalize marijuana.

We'll talk to tribal leaders about their decision.

Not everyone wants legal weed in our state.

We'll talk to two people who deal with the problems drugs can cause everyday.

Plus, you're never too old to learn.

We'll introduce you to a program aiming to get seniors back into the workforce.
